title: 0Controlled-entry access, New kitchen countertops*, Breakfast bar*
posting_body: $1000 OFF YOUR FIRST FULL MONTH + REDUCED RENTS ON 1 & 2 BEDROOMS*
Meridian Court Apartments is pleased to offer affordable senior living (income restrictions apply).

Spacious 1 and 2 bedroom affordable senior apartments offer even more than you’re used to – from newly updated, spacious floor plans with light, bright windows to a variety of planned social events just outside your door.
When you’re not participating in our many onsite activities, take a brisk stroll through our beautifully landscaped courtyards.
Plus, at Meridian Court, we make things easy with conveniently located laundry rooms on every floor and ample parking.
Senior living means comfortability and living better at Meridian Court Apartments.
Use the link below for more details:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 532 Sq.
- Ample closet space with closet organizers
- Pet friendly - Puppies and kittens welcome (breed restrictions apply)
Pet friendly - Puppies and kittens welcome (breed restrictions apply).
